results.title: Knuckle Busters for Commodore 64/128
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette, cover and packing foam in a plastic cassette case.
results.brief_description: Knuckle Busters [computer game]. Knuckle Busters is a single player side scrolling action platformer. Players take on the role of Deke, a criminal escaping from a prision facility. Due to Deke’s tampering with the Central Computer, the facility and the city are expected to blow up, thus putting a time limit on the players. Players can jump and drop from platforms, avoid or fight androids, collect items and health from barrels and open doors. Deke’s condition is displayed to the player on a pop up menu including lives left, score, time count down, energy level and current object carried.
results.description: Knuckle Busters [computer game]. Knuckle Busters is a single player side scrolling action platformer. Deke’s condition is displayed to the player on a pop up menu including lives left, score, time count down, energy level and current object carried.

results.title: Witch hunt
results.brief_description: Presented by George Donikan, this documentary is a “Four Corners” style investigation into the so-called Greek Social Security Conspiracy Fraud. The whole story of the scandal and the role of the Federal Police and the Department of Social Security is explored in this documentary.
results.description: Presented by George Donikan, this documentary is a “Four Corners” style investigation into the so-called Greek Social Security Conspiracy Fraud. The whole story of the scandal and the role of the Federal Police and the Department of Social Security is explored in this documentary.

results.title: Second reality
results.creator_credit: Stacey Fischer, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Always on the move, changing schools, losing new friends, Stacey Fischer escaped from the real world of loneliness to a world where she could create people who couldn’t leave - a place where she would be safe.

results.title: Two years or more
results.creator_credit: Georges Dufaux, Gilles Therien, Marc Beaudet and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: An inside look at a modern federal penal institution of the kind built during the past decade, showing improvements that have been made not only in the physical facilities for housing inmates but also in the treatment and training programs. Emphasis is now placed on rehabilitation of the individual rather than on punishment for his crime.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Georges Dufaux, Gilles Therien, Marc Beaudet and National Film Board of Canada

results.title: A Sad realisation
results.creator_credit: Vivian Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The sight of ugly bare land and the sound of heavy machinery where once stood a forest of trees are all too real for Vivian Tran to block out. Trees cannot protect themselves against being logged. A poignant story.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Vivian Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Two women = La Ciociara
results.creator_credit: Vittorio De Sica, Carlo Ponti, Societe Generale de Cinematographie, Cocinor and Compagnia Cinematografica Champion Films Marceau
results.brief_description: The story centers on a widow (Sophia Loren) who runs a tiny grocery store in Rome. When the store is bombed, she decides to return to her native village with her 13 year old daughter (Eleonora Brown). Back in her village, a timid schoolteacher (Jean-Paul Belmondo) falls in love with her. Her young daughter also secretly falls in love with him and becomes alienated from her mother because of it. While he is on a war mision, he is killed and the mother and daughter become friends once more and agree to carry on. They seek refuge in a church as they make they way back to Rome and encounter an event that will change their lives forever. Version dubbed in English. Adapted from a novel by Alberto Moravia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Vittorio De Sica, Carlo Ponti, Societe Generale de Cinematographie, Cocinor and Compagnia Cinematografica Champion Films Marceau

results.title: The Tran family
results.creator_credit: Thuy Tran, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description:
This story is dedicated to Thuy Tran’s father who suddenly found himself raising a family of six young children single-handedly when his wife unexpectedly passed away.
A brief introduction to each member of the Tran family is presented along with a personal tribute from Thuy to her father.

results.title: iFavourite
results.creator_credit: Peter Ngo, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A glimpse into Peter Ngo’s world of techno music, video games, video editing and fun in the sun at the Alpine School. To Ngo’s mind, doing what you enjoy is the path to happiness and finding yourself.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Peter Ngo, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: A glimpse into Peter Ngo’s world of techno music, video games, video editing and fun in the sun at the Alpine School. To Ngo’s mind, doing what you enjoy is the path to happiness and finding yourself.
description_for_label: A glimpse into Peter Ngo’s world of techno music, video games, video editing and fun in the sun at the Alpine School. To Ngo’s mind, doing what you enjoy is the path to happiness and finding yourself.

results.title: Hungry Horace for Commodore 64
results.material_description: Cassette tape computer game. Cassette and cover in a plastic cassette case.
results.brief_description: Hungry Horace [computer game]. Hungry Horace is a top down single player arcade game similar to Pac Man. Players control Horace through a maze collecting flowers and guards lunches while avoiding capture by the park guards. Horace can ring alarms and frighten guards from the park. If Horace is caught three times, he is thrown out of the park and the game ends.
results.description: Hungry Horace [computer game]. Hungry Horace is a top down single player arcade game similar to Pac Man. Players control Horace through a maze collecting flowers and guards lunches while avoiding capture by the park guards. Horace can ring alarms and frighten guards from the park. If Horace is caught three times, he is thrown out of the park and the game ends.

Players control Horace through a maze collecting flowers and guards lunches while avoiding capture by the park guards. Horace can ring alarms and frighten guards from the park.
